thread.section_title: The Grosvenor Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing Afternoon Tea
thread.title_full: Amazing Afternoon Tea - Review of The Grosvenor Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: MissCLane
title: Amazing Afternoon Tea
text: This hotel is in a fantastic location and the interior is beautiful. I held a Baby Shower in the lounge and was impressed at how they decorated the area and made my guests feel welcome. The tea was delicious, plentiful and well presented. The champagne was rather nice also! Our server, Anais, was delightful and I will be recommending this hotel to all :)
